text: Ni chichiwichidwa chitabu (chamasengo gao), ni chinchaona akulewa ali wawoga ligongo lya yaili mwalakwemo, ni tachitiji: “Kutapana kwetuwe! Ana chele chitabuchi chanti uli! Changaleka (chindu) chamwana namuno chekulungwa ikaweje kuchikusanya (pakuchilemba ni manambala gakwe)!” Ni tachiisimana yosope yawapanganyisye ili iyiche (ni kuwichidwa paujo pao). Soni Ambuje wenu wangantenda lupuso jwalijose
